ui

Interface Animated


  • public interface Animated
    A group of methods for classes of objects that are animated.
    Since:
    CAH1.0
    Version:
    CAH1.0
    Author:
    Holt Maki

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void grow(int pct, int sec)
      Grows the object by a certain percent.
      void grow(int newX, int newY, int sec)
      Grows the object to a new size.

    • Method Detail

      • grow

        void grow(int newX,
        int newY,
        int sec)
        Grows the object to a new size.
        Parameters:
        newX - - the new X size.
        newY - - the new Y size.
        sec - - The number of seconds it takes to grow the object.
        Since:
        CAH1.0

      • grow

        void grow(int pct,
        int sec)
        Grows the object by a certain percent.
        Parameters:
        pct - - the percentage by which the object grows. If it is negative, the object shrinks.
        sec - - the number of seconds it takes to grow the object.
        Since:
        CAH1.0
